errorDialog.title: Whoops! Something went wrong
errorDialog.unsavedContents: Please note that unsaved content will not be saved when reloading. If you have unsaved content on this page, you can close this message and copy the content to the clipboard before reloading.
errorDialog.reportIssue: If the problem persists, contact support@metatavu.fi by email. Please include technical details in to the email to speed up resolution of the problem.

deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this?
deleteAccountDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccountDialogText: If you press yes your account can't be recovered. You will be redirected to login page.

aboutScreen.title: Megasense data portal UI
aboutScreen.subTitle: Clean air routing web application. Product developed as a part of a Megasense consortium.
aboutScreen.descriptionText: Provides clean air route building capabilities. Features user tailored post-routing user statistics. Application is currently in development.
